Culinary Science.1: Integrate culinary principles with food science concepts.
Culinary Science.2: Apply chemical, physical and functional properties of foods and ingredients in product development.
Culinary Science.3: Evaluate food products by both sensory and objective methods.
Culinary Science.4: Describe the elements of the scientific method as it relates to food experimentation.
Culinary Science.5: Design and conduct experiments that address current trends found in the food industry.
